TRANSFORM YOUR LIFE
WITH THE POWER OF
IBOGA

Go Beyond Your Limits and
Awaken Your True Self
Ready to begin your transformation with Iboga?

paragraphs: Discover world-class traditional healing, expert guidance, and sacred ceremonies to help you achieve your spiritual goals, heal deep wounds, burn away trauma, and stay motivated every single day with our transformative Iboga experience.

Step into an Iboga retreat inspired by the ancient Bwiti tradition — a journey designed to awaken your spirit, clear your mind, and strengthen your connection to truth. Guided by experienced providers in a safe and sacred environment, you'll release what no longer serves you and rediscover inner balance, clarity, and power. Every ceremony moves you closer to becoming your most authentic and awakened self.
Transforming lives through the sacred healing power of Iboga and the ancient wisdom of the Bwiti tradition.

https://ibogalifechange.com/about.title: IbogaLife Change - Jay's Healing Practice
paragraphs: Warrior Spirit, Compassionate Guide, Master Provider
Traditionally trained Iboga Bwiti provider, initiated and trained in 2022 under 10th-generation Shaman Moughenda Mikala in Gabon, Africa.

Nzingo's path to Iboga began during one of the most challenging times of his life. After struggling with addiction for over twenty years—caught in a cycle of destructive and self-sabotaging behaviors—he reached a point of deep realization: it was time to break free.

These words marked the beginning of Jay's transformation. What started as a desperate search for healing became a profound spiritual awakening that would reshape not only his life, but the lives of countless others seeking freedom from their own darkness.

In 2022, Nzingo attended his first Iboga retreat in Cancun, Mexico. The experience transformed his life. The profound wisdom, healing, and clarity he received awakened something powerful within him—an undeniable calling to walk the path of service through the sacred Iboga medicine.

This sacred plant medicine didn't just heal his wounds—it revealed his purpose as a guardian of ancient wisdom. From the depths of struggle to the heights of spiritual awakening, Jay's transformation through Iboga ignited an unbreakable calling to serve this sacred medicine.

Just two months later, his calling led him to Gabon, Africa, the birthplace of the Bwiti tradition. There, under the direct guidance of Shaman Moughenda Mikala, Nzingo immersed himself in the traditional study of Iboga, learning the ancient spiritual, energetic, and healing practices that have been passed down for generations.
Training with 10th-generation Shaman Moughenda Mikala
Immersed in ancient Bwiti rituals and sacred fire ceremonies

Upon returning to Canada, Nzingo founded his own Iboga retreat practice, dedicated to helping others find freedom from their own struggles—whether it be addiction, trauma, anxiety, depression, or emotional stagnation. Through the wisdom of Iboga, he helps people reconnect with their true selves and remember who they are beyond pain and limitation.

Jay's mission is to be a bridge between the ancient wisdom of plant medicine and the modern world's need for healing. With strength, love, and dedication, he guides souls through their journey of transformation, helping them reclaim their power and purpose.
Jay's powerful physical presence creates a container of safety, allowing participants to fully surrender to their healing journey. His strength gives others permission to be vulnerable.
Living in harmony with nature has taught Jay the rhythms of transformation. He brings this primal wisdom to every ceremony, creating space for authentic healing.
Combining the fierce protection of a warrior with deep compassion, Jay guides each person through their darkest moments into the light of understanding and healing.
Jay approaches his work with the utmost reverence and responsibility, understanding that he is a guardian of sacred medicine and a guide for souls in transformation.
Initiated and trained in 2022 under 10th-generation Shaman Moughenda Mikala in Gabon, Africa
First transformative Iboga experience in Cancun, Mexico, followed by direct training in Gabon
Overcame 20+ years of addiction and destructive patterns through the medicine
Immersed in traditional spiritual, energetic, and healing practices of the Bwiti tradition
Founded Iboga retreat practice in Canada, serving those seeking freedom from suffering
Dedicated to helping others reconnect with their true selves beyond pain and limitation
"We don't have to stay stuck in our suffering. There is light on the other side—and Iboga helps us find it"
Proud to serve this sacred medicine to those seeking real change in their life
Honoring the ancient Bwiti practices passed down through generations
Helping people remember who they are beyond addiction, trauma, and emotional stagnation
"Jay's presence is like having a guardian angel and a fierce protector all in one. His strength gave me the courage to face my deepest fears."
"The combination of Jay's physical power and spiritual wisdom created the perfect environment for my transformation. I felt completely safe."
"Jay is like a force of nature - strong, grounded, and deeply connected. His guidance through my Iboga journey was life-changing."

"My mission is to be a bridge between the ancient wisdom of plant medicine and the modern world's need for healing. With strength, love, and dedication, I guide souls through their journey of transformation, helping them reclaim their power and purpose."
If you feel called to experience the transformative power of Iboga with a guide who embodies strength, wisdom, and compassion, reach out today.
Transforming lives through the sacred healing power of Iboga and the ancient wisdom of the Bwiti tradition.

About Jay

Warrior Spirit, Compassionate Guide, Master Provider

Meet Jason Nzingo Gho Majanja

Traditionally trained Iboga Bwiti provider, initiated and trained in 2022 under 10th-generation Shaman Moughenda Mikala in Gabon, Africa.

The Calling

Nzingo's path to Iboga began during one of the most challenging times of his life. After struggling with addiction for over twenty years—caught in a cycle of destructive and self-sabotaging behaviors—he reached a point of deep realization: it was time to break free.

"I was done with the struggling. I was done with the suffering. I was done with the pain."

These words marked the beginning of Jay's transformation. What started as a desperate search for healing became a profound spiritual awakening that would reshape not only his life, but the lives of countless others seeking freedom from their own darkness.

The Transformation

In 2022, Nzingo attended his first Iboga retreat in Cancun, Mexico. The experience transformed his life. The profound wisdom, healing, and clarity he received awakened something powerful within him—an undeniable calling to walk the path of service through the sacred Iboga medicine.

This sacred plant medicine didn't just heal his wounds—it revealed his purpose as a guardian of ancient wisdom. From the depths of struggle to the heights of spiritual awakening, Jay's transformation through Iboga ignited an unbreakable calling to serve this sacred medicine.

The Training

Just two months later, his calling led him to Gabon, Africa, the birthplace of the Bwiti tradition. There, under the direct guidance of Shaman Moughenda Mikala, Nzingo immersed himself in the traditional study of Iboga, learning the ancient spiritual, energetic, and healing practices that have been passed down for generations.

Training with 10th-generation Shaman Moughenda Mikala

Immersed in ancient Bwiti rituals and sacred fire ceremonies

The Mission

Upon returning to Canada, Nzingo founded his own Iboga retreat practice, dedicated to helping others find freedom from their own struggles—whether it be addiction, trauma, anxiety, depression, or emotional stagnation. Through the wisdom of Iboga, he helps people reconnect with their true selves and remember who they are beyond pain and limitation.

"I'm proud to serve this sacred medicine to those seeking real change in their life. We don't have to stay stuck in our suffering. There is light on the other side—and Iboga helps us find it."

Jay's mission is to be a bridge between the ancient wisdom of plant medicine and the modern world's need for healing. With strength, love, and dedication, he guides souls through their journey of transformation, helping them reclaim their power and purpose.

Philosophy & Approach
Strength Through Presence

Jay's powerful physical presence creates a container of safety, allowing participants to fully surrender to their healing journey. His strength gives others permission to be vulnerable.

Nature's Wisdom

Living in harmony with nature has taught Jay the rhythms of transformation. He brings this primal wisdom to every ceremony, creating space for authentic healing.

Warrior Compassion

Combining the fierce protection of a warrior with deep compassion, Jay guides each person through their darkest moments into the light of understanding and healing.

Sacred Responsibility

Jay approaches his work with the utmost reverence and responsibility, understanding that he is a guardian of sacred medicine and a guide for souls in transformation.

Training & Journey
🏺
Traditional Initiation

Initiated and trained in 2022 under 10th-generation Shaman Moughenda Mikala in Gabon, Africa

🌍
Sacred Journey

First transformative Iboga experience in Cancun, Mexico, followed by direct training in Gabon

🔥
Personal Transformation

Overcame 20+ years of addiction and destructive patterns through the medicine

🌿
Ancient Wisdom

Immersed in traditional spiritual, energetic, and healing practices of the Bwiti tradition

🍃
Canadian Practice

Founded Iboga retreat practice in Canada, serving those seeking freedom from suffering

💫
Path of Service

Dedicated to helping others reconnect with their true selves beyond pain and limitation

Core Values
🔥
Authentic Transformation

"We don't have to stay stuck in our suffering. There is light on the other side—and Iboga helps us find it"

🛡️
Sacred Service

Proud to serve this sacred medicine to those seeking real change in their life

🌿
Traditional Wisdom

Honoring the ancient Bwiti practices passed down through generations

❤️
Compassionate Healing

Helping people remember who they are beyond addiction, trauma, and emotional stagnation

What People Say About Jay

"Jay's presence is like having a guardian angel and a fierce protector all in one. His strength gave me the courage to face my deepest fears."

- Maria K.

"The combination of Jay's physical power and spiritual wisdom created the perfect environment for my transformation. I felt completely safe."

- David L.

"Jay is like a force of nature - strong, grounded, and deeply connected. His guidance through my Iboga journey was life-changing."

- Jennifer R.
The Mission

"My mission is to be a bridge between the ancient wisdom of plant medicine and the modern world's need for healing. With strength, love, and dedication, I guide souls through their journey of transformation, helping them reclaim their power and purpose."

- Jay

Ready to Work with Jay?

If you feel called to experience the transformative power of Iboga with a guide who embodies strength, wisdom, and compassion, reach out today.

CONTACT JAY

Transforming lives through the sacred healing power of Iboga and the ancient wisdom of the Bwiti tradition.

headings.text: Ready to begin your healing with Iboga?

paragraphs: Discover the transformative healing powers across physical, mental, and spiritual dimensions

In our modern world where depression, anxiety, addiction, and chronic illness have become increasingly common, Iboga emerges as a powerful medicine offering essential keys to restoring and maintaining health within ourselves and our communities. This sacred plant works on multiple levels - physical, mental, and spiritual - providing comprehensive healing that addresses the root causes of suffering.

The healing properties of Iboga are both profound and far-reaching. Physically, it acts as a powerful detoxifier, rapidly cleansing the body while addressing numerous ailments. Mentally and spiritually, it facilitates deep introspection and trauma release, helping individuals reconnect with their authentic selves and life purpose.
Complete body regeneration through cellular detoxification and healing
Detoxifying the entire body at the cellular level
Resetting neurotransmitters & increasing neuroplasticity
Cleansing & balancing the body for optimal performance
Repairing through antiparasitic, antifungal, antibacterial, antiviral properties
Reducing inflammation & relieving attachment to pain

Iboga root contains potent bitter compounds that work rapidly to detoxify the body at the cellular level. This powerful plant medicine addresses a wide range of physical conditions including heavy metal buildup, viral infections like HPV and herpes, skin conditions such as acne, Lyme disease, chronic fatigue syndrome, insomnia, and various digestive problems.

Beyond detoxification, Iboga's anti-viral, anti-bacterial, anti-fungal, and anti-parasitic properties work synergistically to repair and restore the body's natural healing mechanisms. This comprehensive approach to physical healing creates the foundation for optimal health and vitality.
Deep psychological transformation through seeing the truth and neural rewiring
Detoxing unnecessary conscious & subconscious thoughts
Showing us all the ways we lie to ourselves so we can be 100% honest
Returning the mind to its natural state of peace & clarity
Eliminating external programming & making room for truth
Guiding us in releasing attachments to the past

The visionary nature of Iboga often facilitates profound inner journeys that enable participants to clear past traumas and discover the root causes of what prevents them from living with joy and purpose. This sacred medicine effectively supports healing from depression, anxiety, PTSD, bipolar disorder, ADD, ADHD, addiction, and obsessive-compulsive behaviors.

Through its unique ability to facilitate honest self-examination, Iboga helps individuals see through the lies they tell themselves, eliminate external programming, and return the mind to its natural state of peace and clarity. This process of mental detoxification creates space for truth and authentic living.

Iboga is globally recognized for its remarkable anti-addictive properties and plays a crucial role in the detoxification and rehabilitation from various substances including amphetamines, opiates, alcohol, nicotine, and many pharmaceuticals. Unlike conventional treatments, Iboga not only strips harmful substances from the body and reduces withdrawal discomfort, but also invites participants to examine the original reasons behind their substance use.

This unique combination of physical detoxification and psychological insight addresses addiction at its core, offering individuals a genuine opportunity for lasting recovery and transformation. The medicine guides people to understand their patterns and make conscious choices for their healing.
Transforming lives through the sacred healing power of Iboga and the ancient wisdom of the Bwiti tradition.

headings.text: A True Carrier of Ancient Wisdom
A Living Bridge to Ancient Wisdom
A Pillar of Strength, Wisdom, and Compassion
Protecting Iboga, The Tree of Knowledge

paragraphs: 10th Generation Bwiti Shaman - Guardian of Ancient Wisdom

Moughenda stands as one of the most respected and recognized 10th-generation Bwiti Shamans in the world—a true guardian of ancient wisdom, sacred lineage, and timeless tradition. Born into a distinguished line of Bwiti healers in Gabon, Central Africa, he was immersed from birth in the sacred teachings, ceremonies, and profound responsibilities of the Missoko Bwiti tradition.
From his earliest years, it became clear that his spiritual path was not something he chose—it was divinely chosen for him, a calling that would define his life's purpose.

As a 10th-generation shaman, Moughenda embodies a living connection between the ancient world and our modern times. He carries within him a sacred lineage that has been preserved and transmitted through countless generations—the medicine, the teachings, the rituals, and most importantly, the eternal truths that form the heart of the Bwiti tradition.

His sacred role extends far beyond serving Iboga. He is the guardian of tradition, protector of the sacred tree, keeper of ancient teachings, and guide who leads seekers back to their authentic selves through truth, discipline, and spirit.
Moughenda's influence extends across continents, touching thousands of lives with his profound wisdom and healing presence.
Complete understanding of the sacred plant's healing properties and ceremonial application
Deep comprehension of spiritual realms and their connection to healing
Exceptional ability to guide individuals through transformative healing journeys
Unwavering commitment to truth and maintaining authentic spiritual connection
Dedicated leadership in preserving and protecting the Bwiti sacred tradition

He has guided thousands of souls—from those battling addiction to seekers of purpose, clarity, healing, or spiritual reconnection. headings.text: A Path of Healing and Awakening

paragraphs: Ancient wisdom, sacred rituals, and the path to spiritual enlightenment

The Bwiti Tradition is an ancient spiritual path originating from the forests of Gabon, Central Africa, carried for generations by the Fang, Mitsogo, and Apinji peoples. It is not a religion in the Western sense, but a way of life — a lived wisdom rooted in truth, self-knowledge, and direct experience.

At the heart of Bwiti is the understanding that everything we need is already within us. The tradition guides people to remember who they truly are beneath fear, trauma, addiction, and the stories that life places on them. Rather than giving beliefs to follow, Bwiti opens the door for people to see for themselves.

The sacred plant medicine Iboga is central within the Bwiti path. It is known as the "Tree of Knowledge," a master teacher that helps individuals reconnect with their soul, confront their truth, and release the burdens they've been carrying — sometimes for decades or even generations.

Within the Bwiti, Iboga is not used casually or recreationally. It is taken with deep reverence, ceremony, and preparation. Traditionally trained providers support guests spiritually, emotionally, and physically through the process, ensuring safety, clarity, and guidance.
Bwiti doesn't preach dogma. Instead, it teaches truth through direct experience:
Discovering your authentic self beneath all conditioning
Understanding the patterns and stories that shape your reality
Connecting with your soul's mission and life direction
Releasing what no longer serves your highest good
Restoring connection with your soul and ancestors
Embodying honesty, truth, and personal responsibility
Music, dance, fire, storytelling, and community all play important roles. These elements help open the senses, anchor the mind, and connect participants with the spiritual world.
Many people come to Bwiti seeking healing from:
Through Iboga and the teachings, they often gain clarity, peace, and a renewed sense of who they are.

Traditionally trained Bwiti providers carry this knowledge with the highest respect. They serve as bridges between the ancient Gabonese wisdom and those searching for healing in the modern world. Their role is not to "fix" anyone, but to guide them back to themselves.

The preservation of this sacred tradition ensures that future generations can access these powerful teachings and continue the unbroken chain of wisdom that has been passed down for centuries through initiation, ceremony, and lived experience.
Discover how the ancient Bwiti tradition can guide you on your journey of healing and self-discovery
Transforming lives through the sacred healing power of Iboga and the ancient wisdom of the Bwiti tradition.

headings.text: Ready to begin your transformation with Iboga?

paragraphs: Discover the ancient wisdom of West African plant medicine

Iboga, the root bark of the Iboga tree, is a West African plant medicine used for thousands of years by locals as a sacrament for deep healing and spiritual discovery. It is now renowned as the most effective plant medicine in promoting and sustaining positive long-term change in people's lives.
This powerful medicine works on multiple levels - physical, mental, and spiritual - offering profound insights and healing that can transform your relationship with yourself and the world around you.

Recognized as one of humanity's most ancient visionary plant medicines, the Iboga plant flourishes in the dense rainforests of West Africa. For millennia, this sacred medicine has served as a cornerstone for healing and spiritual initiation, now emerging to share its profound wisdom with our modern world.

In an era where depression, anxiety, addiction, and illness have become widespread challenges, this powerful medicine offers essential keys to restoring and maintaining wellness within ourselves and our communities.

The Iboga root contains potent bitter compounds that rapidly cleanse the body and address numerous physical conditions including heavy metal toxicity, viral infections, skin disorders, Lyme disease, chronic fatigue, sleep disturbances, and digestive issues.

The visionary nature of this plant medicine often guides participants through profound inner journeys, enabling the release of past traumas and revealing the root causes of what prevents living with joy and purpose. Iboga effectively supports recovery from depression, anxiety, PTSD, bipolar disorder, attention disorders, addiction, and obsessive behaviors.

Renowned for its remarkable anti-addictive properties, Iboga serves as a crucial ally in overcoming dependencies on stimulants, opiates, alcohol, nicotine, and various pharmaceuticals. Beyond physical detoxification and withdrawal relief, it invites deep introspection into the underlying reasons for substance use.

During the Iboga ceremony, the inner root bark of the Tabernanthe Iboga plant is carefully prepared into a fine powder and consumed. While each person's experience is unique, the common journey leads inward—a profound exploration of self-discovery where participants reconnect with their soul and life purpose.

This sacred process grounds individuals in their authentic truth, awakening deep gratitude for life itself—the understanding that existence is the greatest gift of all. Iboga and the Bwiti tradition restore our reverence and connection to both Earth and ourselves, clearing away the accumulated burdens of life's challenges.
Discover the ancient wisdom of Iboga, a powerful plant medicine used for thousands of years for deep healing and spiritual transformation.
Experience authentic Bwiti ceremonies guided by experienced practitioners in a safe and sacred environment designed for healing.

While there exists a synthetic derivative called Ibogaine used primarily for addiction treatment in clinical settings, we honor the complete Iboga root bark containing its full spectrum of natural alkaloids. This whole-plant approach provides access to the medicine's complete range of healing properties as nature intended.
Transforming lives through the sacred healing power of Iboga and the ancient wisdom of the Bwiti tradition.
